item.description:
Most people I know have to work on Monday (Columbus Day), but I don't.

If you're looking for something to do, why not join me on the Washington Secondary bike path?

We'll bike the path for about 17 miles, turn around and hit crowd favorite Mr Taco's on the way back. (I *did* call ahead, and they said that they would be open.)

This is a social bike ride - NOT a fast ride. We usually go at a 12 mph pace. I'd like to increase it to 14 this time (I'll slow down if people find it too fast).

We'll meet right in front of the KMART parking lot and start biking. Can't find me? Make sure to take my cell # with you --- (401) 699-7304!
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red car and a red bike - Try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: BIKING Washington Secondary + Mr Taco ~35 miles
